verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are God alone,
You are God none compares;
You are God alone,
You are God none compares.
Your grace is sufficient
To carry me home,
You are God alone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My life is in Your hands;
Lord I surrender to Your plan
As You're fashioning and forming me
To the image of Your Son,
You are God alone.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You lift me up on eagle's wings
High above the storm
Your peace pierces through
The darkness of the night,
You are God alone.
